description:
Binary Holds are now making their hold packs out of recycled plastic, so future generations can enjoy getting a grip on our planet too.

These small holds will test your resolve and being slightly bigger than the mounting-screw head, these miniscule holds put your footwork to the test.

  • Made from Recycled ABS
  • Includes mounting hardware
name: Binary Holds Bytes Recycled 14 Foothold Pack
